name: 6 PACK SMALL SOAPS Practical Holiday Gift Idea
description:
These small size homemade shea butter soaps are the perfect gift idea for holiday or Christmas stocking stuffers. We have 12 beautiful colors to choose from with delicious coordinating scents, not just the typical red and green. Our soaps are made with an all natural glycerin base and we've added luxurious shea butter, exfoliating poppy seeds, and decadent scents for an elegant stocking stuffer everyone's sure to love!

Each mini soap measures approximately 1-1/2" by 1-1/2" by 5/8" in size, and weigh approximately .7 oz /20 g each.

Each 6 pack of soaps comes wrapped in a clear bag with beautiful sheer silver ribbon, silver foil labels, and a back label including ingredients.

Choose your quantity:

If you would like a different quantity than available, please contact me and we can set up a special listing with the exact amount you want!

During checkout, in the NOTES TO SELLER Section, please let us know:

1) Choose your label design:

Happy Holidays
A Gift for You
Name of Scent

3) Choose from 12 beautiful colors with coordinating scents:

Red - Red Currant
Pink - Pink Peony
Coral - Mango Papaya
Yellow - Lemongrass Mint
Gold - Milk & Honey
Orange - Island Breeze
Purple - Plumeria Blossom
Blue - Crystal Waters
Green - Ginger Lime
White - Fresh Linen
Gray - Gray Skies
Brown - Vanilla Oakmoss

Bulk Pricing Available:

1-3 stocking stuffers - $7.00 each
4-9 stocking stuffers - $6.50 each
10-24 stocking stuffers - $6.00 each
25-49 stocking stuffers - $5.50 each
50-99 stocking stuffers - $4.50 each
100 or more stocking stuffers - $4.00 each

Looking for other sizes?

As seen in the last picture, we have several size options. Just check out the other sections of our store by clicking on the product pages to the left of the screen:

Our all natural soaps contain no SLS, parabens, petroleum, or propylene glycol.

FLAT RATE SHIPPING ONLY $7.95 FOR US ORDERS

name: KILLIAN'S IRISH RED BEER SOAP The Perfect Gift for Him Made With Real Beer
description:
A unique gift, this homemade beer soap made from scratch with real Killian's Irish Red beer and designed to look like the beer itself.  Scented with Oatmeal Stout fragrance, which is a full bodied and smooth beer fragrance blended with scents of oatmeal, orange Peel, butterscotch, milk, almond and rich vanilla. Smells edible like oatmeal cookies, and it's a wonderful scent men and women alike love!

Why use beer soap? Hops, an ingredient found in beer, is known to soothe irritated skin, and contains polyphenols which act as an antibacterial agent. Beer also contains skin-softening amino acids.

KILLIAN'S IRISH RED BEER SOAP

Minimum weight 4 oz/113 g

INGREDIENTS: olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, Killian's Irish Red beer, distilled water, sodium hydroxide, unrefined shea butter, coloring, fragrance

Our soaps contain no SLS, parabens, petroleum, or propylene glycol.

All of our soaps are made, cut, and packaged by hand with care. Packaged in a clear protective soap box making it perfect for gift giving.

Also available in a 3 pack beer set with Killian's Irish Red, Guinness, and Heineken: http://www.gingergreysoaps.com/product/best-gift-for-men-handmade-beer-soap-set-coolest-unique-gift-for-man-gift-for-husband

name: YUZU AND PINK HIMALAYAN SEA SALT Handmade Salt Soap Spa Bar with Custom Labels
description:
Indulge yourself with our handmade luxurious Pink Himalayan Sea Salt shea butter soap bar with an intoxicating Japanese Yuzu scent.  Yuzu, also known as Japanese grapefruit has a fragrant citrus scent that is just the right blend of sweet and tart and is simply amazing!  This scent blends beautifully with our skin nourishing shea butter glycerin soap topped with Pink Himalayan Sea Salt.  

Beautiful to display in a vintage dish in your bathroom or as the perfect gift for the holidays and special occasions. Your soap will arrive with your choice of silver label and packaged in a clear bag with silver sheer ribbon, making it ready for gift giving.

Pink Himalayan Sea Salt has a rich mineral content that includes over 84 minerals and trace elements and is believed to be the purest form of salt available.  In Japan, bathing with Yuzu on Tōji, the winter solstice, is a custom that dates to at least the early 18th century.  Whole yuzu fruits are floated in the hot water of the bath, sometimes enclosed in a cloth bag, releasing their relaxing aroma.  No need to go to the spa, kick back, relax, and enjoy our indulgent Yuzu Pink Sea Salt Bar!  

PLEASE NOTE: Due to the sea salt, this doesn't lather as well as our usual glycerin soaps, but it's still very luxurious and wonderful on your skin!

YUZU & PINK SEA SALT

Minimum weight 4 oz.

INGREDIENTS: coconut oil, palm oil, safflower oil, glycerin, purified water, sodium hydroxide, sorbitol, sorbitan oleate, soy bean protein, pink Himalayan sea salt, unrefined shea butter, titanium dioxide, fragrance

Our soaps contain no SLS, parabens, petroleum, or propylene glycol.

All of our soaps are made, cut, and packaged by hand with care.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR LABEL - During checkout, please choose which customized label you would like or if you would like only the scent name as shown. The second to last picture is an example of packaging.

Smells edible and it's a wonderful scent men and women alike love!

Why use beer soap? Hops, an ingredient found in beer, is known to soothe irritated skin, and contains polyphenols which act as an antibacterial agent. Beer also contains skin-softening amino acids.

KILLIAN'S IRISH RED

name: TOBACCO SOAP Homemade Glycerin Soap for Men
description:
This is a real manly scented homemade tobacco glycerin soap just for men, the perfect gift.  Black and brown layers with patchouli leaves sprinkled in make for a beautiful and great smelling home made soap that would be great for hands or the bath.

TOBACCO

Approximately 4 oz bar

INGREDIENTS: coconut oil, palm oil, safflower oil, glycerin, purified water, sodium hydroxide, sorbitol, sorbitan oleate, soy bean protein, titanium dioxide, patchouli leaves, coloring, fragrance

Our soaps contain no SLS, parabens, petroleum, or propylene glycol.

All of our soaps are made, cut, and packaged by hand with care.
